name: part_005
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2025】生誕 3D LIVE 睡夢 - suimu -【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [eV59GTk0J3s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Shirogane Noel performs 'Ours (Acoustic & Piano ver)'. During the performance, she undergoes a magical 3D outfit transformation.
MC segment where Noel talks about her new outfit, has a screenshot time with various poses, and is joined by her mascot Daifuku.
Shirogane Noel performs 'Bouya no Yume yo' while riding a boat on a digital ocean.

subtitles.original: 目を閉じてみたんだ
subtitles.english: I tried closing my eyes.

subtitles.original: 今夜　私たちだけで眠ろう
subtitles.english: Tonight, let's sleep just by ourselves.

subtitles.original: 誰にも言わないで
subtitles.english: Don't tell anyone.

subtitles.original: 君が眠りにつくその少し前に
subtitles.english: Just a little before you fall asleep,

subtitles.original: 名前を呼んで
subtitles.english: call my name.

subtitles.original: 叶わない願いに胸は痛んで
subtitles.english: My heart aches for a wish that won't come true,

subtitles.original: 俯いてしまうけど
subtitles.english: and I end up looking down, but

subtitles.original: 誰もいない街へ誘いに行くから
subtitles.english: I'll go and invite you to a town where nobody is.

subtitles.original: 今日はこのままさよならじゃないよ
subtitles.english: Today isn't a goodbye just like this.

subtitles.original: 手をとってくれたなら
subtitles.english: If you take my hand,

subtitles.original: 秘密も眠りにつくような夜に
subtitles.english: in a night where even secrets seem to fall asleep,

subtitles.original: 君を連れていくよ
subtitles.english: I'll take you away.

subtitles.original: それは例えば遠く離れていたって
subtitles.english: For example, even if we were far apart,

subtitles.original: 手を繋いでいられるような
subtitles.english: so that we can keep holding hands,

subtitles.original: 奇跡のような話をしよう
subtitles.english: let's talk about something like a miracle.

subtitles.original: 窓は開けておいて
subtitles.english: Leave the window open.

subtitles.original: 聞こえる？
subtitles.english: Can you hear it?

subtitles.original: 愛おしいことや、なくせないものを
subtitles.english: Lovely things and things we can't lose...

subtitles.original: 教えてくれたのは今日みたいな
subtitles.english: What taught me those was a night like today,

subtitles.original: 夜を重ねて織り上げてきた
subtitles.english: layered and woven together,

subtitles.original: 私たちに響く音
subtitles.english: the sound that resonates with us.

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: ということで、皆さん、今回のライブ、
subtitles.english: So, everyone, for this live,

subtitles.original: なんと新衣装がババババーンとありました！
subtitles.english: I unexpectedly had a brand new outfit!

subtitles.original: ということで、あの、びっくりしたかな？びっくりしたんじゃないかなと思います。
subtitles.english: So, um, were you surprised? I think you must have been surprised.

subtitles.original: あの、こちらね、すごい、あの、煌びやかな衣装となっているんですけど、
subtitles.english: Um, this one is a really, um, gorgeous outfit,

subtitles.original: ちょっと今、スクショタイム、撮る？
subtitles.english: Should we have a screenshot time now?

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 可愛いですかー？
subtitles.english: Is it cute?

subtitles.original: ぜひ、あのハッシュタグでね、あのぜひ呟いてください。
subtitles.english: Please, by all means, post with the hashtag.

subtitles.original: 可愛いでしょ？
subtitles.english: It's cute, right?

subtitles.original: 何やらね、この後、ちょっと衣装のね、色々、あの細部までちょっと見る機会がありそうな予感がするので、
subtitles.english: Somehow, I have a feeling there might be a chance to see various details of the outfit later,

subtitles.original: 一旦ね、スクショだけお願いします。
subtitles.english: so for now, please just take screenshots.

subtitles.original: そして、あとこちらね、見て！
subtitles.english: And also, look at this!

subtitles.original: 手首に、プラプラーって紐があるんだけど、これね、取れます！
subtitles.english: There are these dangling ribbons on my wrists, but you see, they're removable!

subtitles.original: じゃあちょっと取ってもらおうかな。
subtitles.english: Well then, let's have them taken off.

subtitles.original: えい！
subtitles.english: Hah!

subtitles.original: ということで、はい、取れまーす！
subtitles.english: So, yes, they come off!

subtitles.original: こちらバージョンも、スクショ撮ってもらおう。
subtitles.english: Let's have you take screenshots of this version too.

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 可愛いですかー？
subtitles.english: Is it cute?

subtitles.original: ね、すごい、可愛らしい衣装。
subtitles.english: Right? It's a really lovely outfit.

subtitles.original: えっちょっとね、あのドキドキするんですが。
subtitles.english: Um, I'm a bit nervous though.

subtitles.original: うーん。いやー、なんかでもちょっと一人寂しいな。
subtitles.english: Hmm. Man, but somehow I feel a bit lonely being alone.

subtitles.original: なんか、団員さん…うーん…
subtitles.english: I wonder if the Danins... hmm...

subtitles.original: あっ！だ、ダイ福くん！お、なんかモゾモゾしてる。おっどうしたどうしたどうした？
subtitles.english: Ah! Dai- Daifuku-kun! Oh, he's squirming. Oh, what's wrong, what's wrong?

subtitles.original: ぐわぁー！
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: ダイ福くん飛んできた！
subtitles.english: Daifuku-kun came flying!

subtitles.original: そんなに、え、ノエちゃんに会いたかったんかな？可愛いね。
subtitles.english: Did you want to see Noe-chan that much? You're cute.

subtitles.original: いっぱいスクショ撮れた？
subtitles.english: Did you get plenty of screenshots?

subtitles.original: うん。ダイ福くんとのツーショット。可愛い。えっなになに？
subtitles.english: Yeah. A two-shot with Daifuku-kun. Cute. Oh, what's this?

subtitles.original: あ、今日は安眠テーマで、あ、心地が良い。あ、なるほどね。ん？
subtitles.english: Ah, since today's theme is "peaceful sleep," ah, it feels good. Ah, I see. Hm?

subtitles.original: 曲のリクエスト？あ、子守唄みたいな曲が聴きたい。あ、そうなの？ダイ福くん。
subtitles.english: A song request? Ah, you want to hear a song like a lullaby. Oh, is that so? Daifuku-kun.

subtitles.original: じゃあせっかくね、ダイ福くん来てくれたし、一緒にじゃあ子守唄、うん。
subtitles.english: Well then, since Daifuku-kun is here, let's sing a lullaby together, yeah.

subtitles.original: 歌うよ、歌う。だからちょっとついてきて。一緒に行くよ。おらおらーい！
subtitles.english: I'll sing, I'll sing. So come along for a bit. We're going together. Here we go!

subtitles.original: 小さな人の子よ
subtitles.english: O little child of man,

subtitles.original: 森へ迷い込んだ
subtitles.english: you've wandered into the forest.

subtitles.original: 大きな次の…
subtitles.english: Into the large next...
